entry.title: All This Time You Were Wrong
entry.summary:
Author: SterekLoverForEver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,279Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: “I've made a mistake,” Paige said out loud. When she decided to go on a walk in the preserve it was partly cloudy, the forecast didn't show it was going to rain but as she got further and further away from her car the worse it looked outside. Paige tried looking at her phone but got no service. Clouds covered the sky and the wind blew harshly, if Paige breathed in hard enough she could smell the rain waiting to fall from the sky.After about 30 minutes of wandering, rain starts pouring from the sky. She's soaked to the bone, freezing cold. By the grace of God, she stops in front of a mansion. ‘It's worth a shot. At least until the rain stops,’ she thinks to herself.She runs up the steps and goes to knock on the door, it swings open. “Stiles? It's raining so hard. I told you to come back earlier,” said a tall, dark, and handsome man. Paige gasped at the sight, she felt like she knew this man but couldn't quite remember his name. The man looks down at her and frowns, “You're not Stiles.”5 Times Paige Thought Derek Had Feelings For Her +1 Time She Realized He Didn't

entry.title: love in sorrow (anchor me same)
entry.summary:
Author: whentheywrite

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,499Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 8

Summary: Derek was twenty-two years old when he decided to stop loving. He just… decided to stop. Finally. Suddenly. Forever.Not everyone. Not exactly. Not his pack, not his memories, not his late family. Not like that.He decided to stop falling in love. It ruined him every time. Derek felt every love like sorrow and decided he was done. He was going to stop. He was never going to fall in love again.It went as planned, until it didn’t.ORDerek gives up on love. After all, it only ever brings him pain.Stiles Stilinski changes that.

entry.title: read the patterns on my skin (let the fire somehow get in)
entry.summary:
Author: buttercup_beetle

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,780Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: The guy’s wearing all-black, down to the biker gloves on his hands. He stomps into the bar, letting the door slam shut in his wake. Stiles watches him, watches as he pulls back his hood, revealing a sharp jawline, bright, brilliant hazel eyes, a furrowed brow- and oh. Stiles hisses out a breath between his teeth, and that’s all it takes. The guy’s head turns, just slightly- and there’s no human alive that should have been able to hear him from that distance. Stiles tilts his chin up, and keeps his poker face steady, even as his heart beat stutters in his chest.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,276Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 43

Summary: Stiles sets everything up for Allison coming over, because he figures this conversation is going to be a multiple hour long affair. It's not everyday that you learn a close family member helped murder an entire family. entry.title: Scar Tissue
entry.summary:
Author: Halevetica

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,968Chapters: 27/55Kudos: 323

Summary: Derek hasn't worked with a partner in years, it's easier to keep his secret if he's alone. However, a new case against a family he's been wanting to take down falls into his lap, only it comes with a catch, he must accept a new partner. He doesn't know if he can work with someone again. But he's desperate to take down the family that took everything from him. All he has to do is keep his new partner in the dark. But what if his new partner has a secret of his own?

entry.title: Flicker in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: Bradbury_04

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,461Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: When Stiles is kidnapped by a supernatural predator hellbent on exploiting Derek Hale’s vulnerabilities, the brooding werewolf storms into the fray — bloodied, furious, and terrifyingly human. But rescues come with unspoken truths, and as danger collides with desperate confessions (“You’re not weakness. But if anything happened to you…”), Stiles realizes the line between ally and something more is thinner than the rope that bound him. Survival’s easy. Surviving each other? That’s where the real claws come out.

entry.title: Toxic Bonds
entry.summary:
Author: simplyn2deep

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,200Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Stiles and Scott used to be inseparable, but their friendship crumbled when Scott refused to accept Stiles' relationship with Derek. Tired of always being the one to compromise, Stiles cut ties and found unexpected camaraderie in Jackson Whittemore, who knew a thing or two about toxic friendships. As Stiles and Jackson form an unbreakable bond, Scott’s resentment only festers, poisoning every interaction.

entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,499Chapters: 9/15Kudos: 245

Summary: Stiles just wants to make sure his friends don’t die from the next supernatural problem that graces their doorstep. Derek just wants to focus on strengthening his pack (and ignoring the itch under his skin whenever Stiles is near).When Stiles discovers a disturbing string of murders that bring him to the preserve, he and Derek are abducted by an unknown group and locked in a basement across the country with no escape. Each night, the two are subjected to odd methods of torture for seemingly no reason, and each day, there is nothing to keep them occupied but themselves. In circumstances neither could have imagined possible, hidden truths are revealed and connections are made with permanent consequences.To survive and escape with their sanity intact, they’ll have to figure out how to work together.Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,169Chapters: 3/17Kudos: 140

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: Debt in love
entry.summary:
Author: ShadowReader29th

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,168Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 5

Summary: I lost my sister and my brother-in-law 2 months ago to a car crash . And losing her left me with a lot of things pain and misery.Not only was she the only relative I still had alive but she was my best friend.Now the only thing I have left to remind me of her is my nephew Alec a 2 year old adorable kid who I got custody of. But between taking care of Alec and trying to support my self has left me in thousand of debt from the hospital. Seeking a quick relief has led me to a bigger debt to one of the worst debt collectors. The hales.Note this summary might change with progress of chapters

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,031Chapters: 11/38Kudos: 22

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,092Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 178

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: Espy
entry.summary:
Author: coffeeNfics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 892Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 34

Summary: “Okay Stiles, just breathe,” He murmured to himself, trying to steady his racing heart. “It’s just a wolf. A really large… gorgeous wolf.”The comment makes the wolf tilt its head and huff out, making careful steps towards the boy.Stiles hesitates, something about his survival instinct screaming at him to back away, and yet it’s something in the wolf’s gaze that holds him captive.

entry.title: from flesh and bone
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,783Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 47

Summary: “Do you think psychopaths can fall in love?”Stiles blinks and slants his head, studying Derek's face, eyebrows drawing in a fraction as he considers his answer.“I think true love requires empathy, which people with antisocial personality disorders tend to lack. But to answer your question, yes. It may be their version of what they believe love is. If they’ve convinced themselves it’s true, it is.”Derek hums in response with a short bob of his head, holding Stiles’ gaze.“Is that what you’ve gleaned so far, if psychopaths can love?” Stiles asks him, his tone curious.Derek shrugs. “Some of it, yeah. It just seems like someone with so much passion would be capable of such a thing.”

entry.title: Alpha's Power
entry.summary:
Author: Aetherial_Book_God

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,207Chapters: 27/30Kudos: 168

Summary: Being Alpha meant Derek had to be the strongest, he had to be strong enough to keep the pack alive. He had to be the one whom the pack looked to for answers, so why was it so hard to say no to the temptation all around him? Particularly food and a certain ADHD human male who seemed to always be there when Derek needed him the most. As Derek's walls begin to crumble Stiles is right there at his side, encouraging him to relax, but Derek can't. He couldn't let down another family, he couldn't have what happened to his family happen to this pack. But what was so bad about letting go every once in a while?

entry.title: Of All The Names I Gave You, My Favourite One is MINE!
entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,941Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he doesn't want to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing. A desperate moment finds the two wolves forging a unplanned bond that might just heal them both. There's a safety that they offer each other and a need that the other can surely fill even if they are vastly different.orStiles has too many names for Derek. Derek is hesitant to accept help and be happy. Stiles has a heavy secret, Derek has a crazy ex and Eli is just a baby.
